parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in remedying the Takata airbag recall can lead to a life-threatening situation, as the faulty airbag inflator can rupture, causing serious injury or death to the passenger.
symptoms: as the issue is related to a recall notice and the lack of available parts for repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The squeaking noise from the brake pedal can be distracting and may indicate a underlying issue with the brake system, which can affect vehicle safety.
symptoms: Squeaking noise from the brake pedal when applying brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pedal Mushiness and Inconsistent Braking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The mushy brake pedal and inconsistent braking can lead to accidents or near-misses, as the driver may not be able to stop the vehicle in time.
symptoms: Brake pedal feels soft or mushy
requires excessive pressure to stop the vehicle
vehicle lurches forward when stopped at a red light.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vibration and noise from the brakes can be a sign of a underlying issue with the brake system, which can affect vehicle safety.
symptoms: Vibration and noise when applying brakes

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unstable Braking and Loss of Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unstable braking and loss of control can lead to accidents or near-misses, as the driver may not be able to maintain control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Vehicle skids or loses control when braking
sudden jerking or violent movements when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Electronic Stability Control (ESC) system can cause the vehicle to lose traction, skid, or rollover, especially when negotiating sharp curves at high speeds, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The skid control sign appears on the dashboard even when the vehicle is stationary
the vehicle skids when negotiating sharp curves
the vehicle does not pull well
and can hardly accelerate above 120 km/hr
the check engine sign and 4LO signs show on the dashboard.
